name: Rival Gangs EXT
description:
Rival Gangs EXT is a top-down, open world sandbox game for the ZX Spectrum 128K, taking influence from the original GTA games.

Choose your own destiny - gain influence & control by completing the missions for your gang, or go in all guns blazing!

Improvements over the original version include:

  • over 20 missions
  • new weapons and Kill Frenzies
  • greatly improved driver AI - more stealing cars, less getting squished!
  • unlock rewards by completing missions
  • multiple endings
  • map enhancements
  • improvements to NPC behaviours
  • new loading screen by Davey "Sloanysoft" Sloan
  • redefinable controls
  • AY music on title screen

A demo version containing the first island of the game is available free of charge.

Please note: an emulator (e.g. Spectaculator, Fuse, ZXSpin etc) or original hardware is required to play this game.

The original Rival Gangs received 5th place in the Best Action / Shoot 'Em Up Game category of the Planeta Sinclair 2021 Game Of The Year Awards.
